::Ramulus/Striker::

Ramulus growls as Manterror's claws dig into his leg, then falls forward as 
something hits the back of his knee, sending him flying forward. He rolls 
into a kneeling position, firing off his double-slagmaker cannon at Manterror.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Striker flies backwards over a boulder as all the shots hit him. He tries to 
raise his gun, but his hand falls. Transforming into beast mode, he rolls 
behind a tree, calling back to the Ark for backup.
